channel.title: Castle wars
channel.description: i need help making my castle wars its a 317pi the only two problem known which idk how to fix are both teams wear the same cape and lobby timer doesnt count down when waiting to get in to a game if you think you can help me please do add me on skype---joshy28496 thank you

item.title: Castle wars
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

[quote=“erlasz, post:12, topic:482285”][quote author=Christmas_tree link=topic=600524.msg4217502#msg4217502 date=1360452510]

he is mad im new to mopascape lol he could of spoke to me with respect no a piece of poo

Respect comes when you post in the correct section. I wasn’t even mad and i wasn’t even being disrespectful.

As we are not a spoon feeding community (which i’m sure you’re aware as you definitely read the global rules) i’m not going to give out code. But i’ll make a suggestion. Go learn to program. The only thing that will hold you back will be your lack of knowledge. Seriously, with the documentation of Java, you can’t go wrong when you get going. Build your knowledge and then begin programming servers.

Get in depth with wL, it’s crappy but it’s good for learning.
[/quote]

lol dude all you do is camp the wrong section and wait for someone new like me to post under it[/quote]

This isn’t call of duty bro. I just happened to be on that section at that point of time.

Read full topic

item.title: Castle wars
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

erlasz:

he is mad im new to mopascape lol he could of spoke to me with respect no a piece of poo

Respect comes when you post in the correct section. I wasn’t even mad and i wasn’t even being disrespectful.

As we are not a spoon feeding community (which i’m sure you’re aware as you definitely read the global rules) i’m not going to give out code. But i’ll make a suggestion. Go learn to program. The only thing that will hold you back will be your lack of knowledge. Seriously, with the documentation of Java, you can’t go wrong when you get going. Build your knowledge and then begin programming servers.

Get in depth with wL, it’s crappy but it’s good for learning.

item.title: Castle wars
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

[quote=“erlasz, post:7, topic:482285”][quote author=CoderOops link=topic=600524.msg4217198#msg4217198 date=1360434499]
Just change the id of the item, which player does get forced to wear… 1 problem less… Enjoy.
[/quote] where would that be under im a new coder :L[/quote]

Not going to spoonfeed you… But as hint: Get Id of cape, which both teams are using, then search for it from server files, and when you find it… Well I’m sure you get what’s next.

Enjoy
